content.text:
<thinking>The user requested health status for ONLY the account service. The Account Agent returned:

- Healthy status confirmation
- Environment details (dev, v3.3)
- Operational systems report

Since:
1. The request was account-specific
2. The toolResult shows healthy status
3. Exact service name reporting is required

Will report "HEALTHY" per instructions while omitting technical details from the response.</thinking>

**Account Service Status**: HEALTHY  
The system is fully operational with no detected issues.
